body: Via Kosmopolito, a link to Kovács and Kováts - a new blog that's "supposed to denote [the two authors'] weekly adventures while working for the Hungarian [EU Council] Presidency."
original_body: Via Kosmopolito, a link to Kovács and Kováts - a new blog that's "supposed to denote [the two authors'] weekly adventures while working for the Hungarian [EU Council] Presidency."
title: Hungary: A New Blog on EU Council Presidency
